dict.acceptation: 正义；公正；法律制裁；审判员，法官；

sent.orig: The result justice refers to justice of judgment, the procedure justice just means justice of process.
sent.trans: 实体公正指的审判结果的正确性；程序公正指的是审判过程的公正。

sent.orig: Legislative Justice is classified into Substantial Justice and Procedure Justice.
sent.trans: 司法公正分为实体的公正和程序的公正。

sent.orig: May divide into justice formally the procedure justice and the essence justice.
sent.trans: 从形式上可以把正义分为程序正义与实质正义。

sent.orig: Generally speaking, if there is no procedure justice, there is no substantive justice.
sent.trans: 在一般情况之下，如果没有程序正义，就很难实现实体正义。

sent.orig: Though owning its unique value independent of Substantial Justice, Procedure Justice has long been neglected.
sent.trans: 程序公正本来有它独立于实体公正的价值，但长期被人忽视。
